page.title: 17PRINCIPAL FEATURES (b)
page.content: The Meden Trail is a very popular walk for the young and old alike, particularly in summer and fine weather. Along the country trail can be found picnic areas where tables and benches are a fixture and picnic lunches can be enjoyed. The Swann Inn is very old and people did not seem to know much about it, apart from the fact that it is the central feature of the village by the village green and was a popular stopping off and visiting place for people travelling to Chesterfield from Mansfield. The feeling of the people towards the new old people's flats are mixed. Some people think that they are a big improvement on the old terraced houses whilst others preferred the terraced houses, saying that they were far more homely.The older people were more in favour of the houses.
